intro:
Will You Become My Purrsonal Butler?
Meow Mission is a cat puzzle adventure set in an outer dimension!
description:
Solve various puzzles in Meow Mission to rescue cats trapped in alien dimensions! The quirky cats you rescue will move to Tomcat House, where they can create memories with Tomcat.

■ Diverse Puzzles
●	Solve based puzzles to search for the cats!
●	Explore puzzles with familiar mechanics and uniquely modified rules in a multi-dimensional space.
●	Each stage brings new challenges to stimulate your problem-solving skills.

■ Housing
●	Rescued cats live safely in Tomcat House, where they can spend special time with Tomcat.
●	Play with the cats in Tomcat House, but be careful—they might be a bit prickly!
●	Decorate Tomcat House with slabs discovered throughout the dimensions and discover the diverse charms of Tomcat.

■ Cat Collection
●	Collect cat friends with various personalities!
●	Spend time with rescued cats to build affection, unlocking special interactions and events.

■ Stories Beyond Dimensions
●	As you grow closer to the cats, hidden stories are unlocked, allowing you to enjoy the unique stories of each cat through comic strips.
●	Experience the charm of diverse stories through bonding with the cats.

Shall we go save these adorable cats?
